name: Ghost vs Wonderland
description:
Help to spread darkness in a happy world!

You control Ghosty, and you mission is to protect the lost souls that are falling from the sky. For each lost soul that reaches the ground, a little bit more of darkness is spread in the wonderland.
To stop you, there are your enemies: the joyful panda and the cute koala. Deal with them.

Controls:
- WASD to control ghosty position.


Play online: https://bluefireteam.github.io/ghost-vs-wonderland

Source code: https://github.com/bluefireteam/ghost-vs-wonderland

⚠️ Disclaimer ⚠️

This game was made by the judges of the jam and it is not eligible for the prize.
